themes: recognizing and uplifting existing successful efforts
key_phrases: directly supporting the grassroots cultural leaders and organizations
especially BIPOC-, queer-, and women-led initiatives
offering operational resources, accessible funding, and platforms for visibility
serving as a connector across the arts community
invest in those who’ve built the foundation
barriers_identified: lack of direct support for grassroots/BIPOC/queer/women-led initiatives
insufficient operational resources and accessible funding
solutions_proposed: direct support for grassroots and underrepresented leaders/organizations
build real relationships within the arts community
serve as a connector rather than creating new systems
